Examples of vectors Vectors have a magnitude (length when drawn) and direction. Physical examples include:
$\vtr {v}$ v v velocity
$\vtr {r}$ r r displacement
$\vtr {E}$ E E electric field
$\vtr {A}$ A A area
$\vtr {f}$ f f force
Quantities with magnitude but not direction are scalars scalars . For example:
$m$ m mass
$U$ U energy
$T$ T temperature
$q$ q charge
